title: Gold Technical Forecast: XAU Nears Major Support. Will Bulls Pounce?
description: Gold prices fell last week but trimmed losses late in the week. Bulls may attempt to drive higher next week, but the technical situation doesn't appear poised to sustain a rally.

authors.name: Thomas Westwater
authors.title: Analyst
authors.descriptionLong: <h2><strong>At DailyFX Since:</strong> 2019</h2>  <h2><strong>Trading Style</strong></h2> <ul> <li>Analytical Profile: Technical and Fundamental</li> <li>Time Frame: Long-Term (Over 2 Weeks)</li> <li>Type: Swing</li> </ul> <p><a href="/research/dna-fx">Can we guess your trading personality?</a></p>   <h2><strong>Experience</strong></h2> <ul>  <li>Trading equities and ETF’s from 2015 and then options in 2017</li> </ul>  <h2><strong>Education</strong></h2> <ul> <li>Bachelor’s degree in Accounting (Graduating Fall 2020)</li> </ul>  <h2><strong>Most Important Trading Lesson Learned</strong></h2>  <p>“Embrace the challenge that comes with trading the markets and be patient as you develop your sense and ability to trade.”</p>
authors.descriptionShort: At DailyFX Since: 2019. Experience: Trading equities and ETF’s from 2015 and then options in 2017.
